text: Josep Maria Benet i Jornet (; 20 June 1940 – 6 April 2020) was a Spanish playwright and television writer. He was born in Barcelona. He was known for creating Nissaga de poder (1996–1998), Laberint d'ombres (1998–2000), El cor de la ciutat (2000–2009) and Ventdelplà (2005–2010). Benet i Jornet died from COVID-19 in Lleida, Spain on 6 April 2020, aged 79.Muere Benet i Jornet, referente de la dramaturgia catalana, a los 79 años a causa del coronavirus ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Spanish playwrights Category:Television writers Category:Writers from Barcelona
title: Josep Maria Benet i Jornet
